page.title: 11Bed Time
page.content: I start getting ready for bed at about 8 o'clock. I go upstairs to my bedroom and get changed into my nighty. I then go to the bathroom to brush my teeth and wash my face and hands. I then go back downstairs and watch television or play a game for about half an hour. At about 8.30 I go upstairs to bed. I sleep in the same bedroom as my brother Vincent. Before going to sleep Vincent chooses a book for me to read to him. He likes me reading all sorts of adventure stories to him like 'The Enchanted Wood' and 'The Magic Faraway Tree'. I read for about 30 minutes then I get into my own bed and talk for a short time and then I go to sleep.
